entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
